titles.title: To direct the Commandant of the Coast Guard to convey certain property in Sault Sainte Marie, Michigan, to the local American Legion Post.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 10/8/1997--Introduced. Directs the Commandant of the Coast Guard to convey to American Legion Post No. 3 specified property in Sault Sainte Marie, Michigan, to be used as a clubhouse.
